txt.en: Repair the small fishing net... again

'Looking for work, are you? Worry not, I have the coin to pay you. I just so happen to have fishing nets that are full of holes and in need of repairing. The large net will require more care, however....\n\n'Here, start with this smaller one.'
Gwían crosses her arms and raises an eyebrow
'Oh dear, I'm afraid you missed a spot there. Could you try fixing that corner?'
Gwían coughs politely, catching your attention
Gwían leans over to inspect your work
Gwían smiles, nodding to herself in approval
'That's all of them! Here is your payment, as promised, and a bit more for bearing with this old woman's nagging!'
Gwían has asked you to repair another small fishing net in Melgobas.
'Ah... your handiwork is sufficient! But before you attempt the large net, why not repair the other small net over there first?'
Gwían wishes to talk to you again. Perhaps she'll let you repair the larger net now...?\n\nShe can be found in Melgobas.
Gwían wishes to talk to you.\n\nShe can be found in Melgobas.
